|}}'''EgoAdventure''' is a German tree-fiction game on the German site [http://www.tolkiens-welt.de/ Tolkien Welt].<ref name="Tolkien Games">[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/egoad.html EgoAdventure] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 2 May 2011)</ref> It has passages of text and multiple-choise questions.<ref name="Tolkien Games"/> It is made by "Fealras".<ref name="Tolkien Games"/><ref>[http://tieba.baidu.com/f?kz=177120564 Baidu, 托尔金相关游戏简介] (retrieved 2 May 2011)</ref>
